events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred last night, causing significant damage to the front bumper and hood. They want to start the claim process immediately.
After reviewing the initial report, the claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a car collision on public roads.
An experienced claims agent specializing in auto accidents has been assigned to assist the policyholder and handle the claim process efficiently.
The customer has been sent confirmation that the claim was successfully received and is now being processed by our claims department.
Request sent to the customer for photos of the damaged vehicle, the police accident report, and copies of the driver’s license and insurance card for verification.
The customer has provided all requested documents including detailed photos and the official police report which help in further assessing the claim.
The assigned claims investigator has begun the process of reviewing all submitted evidence and contacting involved parties to determine fault.
Investigation concluded with a clear understanding that the claimant was not at fault. All documents verified and damage assessment approved.
A settlement offer reflecting the repair costs and rental car reimbursement has been prepared and sent to the claimant for review and approval.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the promptness and fairness of the offer.
The claim has been officially approved following customer acceptance of the terms, and all required internal approvals have been completed.
Payment covering the agreed settlement amount has been processed and issued to the customer’s bank account without delay.
The claim has been officially closed after confirming the customer received payment and repaired their vehicle to their satisfaction.
All case files and correspondence have been archived in the system, ensuring that full documentation is available in future if needed.
